text: BILLIE

BILLIE: BASICALLY, I MEAN, YOU CAN KIND OF
UNDERSTAND IT IF YOU JUST LISTEN.

IT’S A MONSTER WITH A PERSON IN THE BED
THAT’S INTERESTED.

THEY’RE NOT… YEAH, THEY’RE SCARED
OF THEM…
AND IT’S LIKE THEY KNOW THAT IT’S BAD,

BUT SOMETIMES LIKE THE MOST
DANGEROUS SITUATIONS
ARE THE MOST ATTRACTIVE TO YOU.

SO THIS IS THE HOOK. THIS IS THE CHORUS
WITH THE ALARM,

AND OBVIOUSLY I WAS FEELING SOME TYPE
OF WAY WITH THAT.

I WANTED TO DRAW HOW THE SONG SOUNDS,
SO I DREW THAT.

FINNEAS: I THINK THE SECOND VERSE IS LIKE
MY FAVORITE LYRICALLY IN THAT WHOLE SONG.
-FUCK.

ALL OF THE LYRICS IN THE PRE-HOOK
ARE JUST LIKE,

THINGS THAT YOU LIKE MAKE YOU
SYMPATHETICALLY LIKE FLINCH.
-WE WERE IN CHICAGO FOR LOLLAPALOOZA

AND WE HAD TWO OFF DAYS AND IN THOSE
TWO DAYS WAS MY BROTHER’S BIRTHDAY.

WE JUST WERE LIKE FUCKIN’ LET’S RENT OUT
A STUDIO TO JUST SEE WHAT HAPPENS.
WE HAD THIS LIKE BUM, BUM, BUM, BUM…
-IT’S CALLED A SHUFFLE BEAT.

IT’S LIKE, IT’S, YOU KNOW, IT’S NOT
A NEW RHYTHM.

IT’S A, BUT THERE… IT’S A VERY SPECIFIC
GROOVE OF IT.

THE KICK IS ON THE FLOOR AND THERE’S A
SORT OF A SECONDARY KICK
OR A TOM THAT’S TAPPING ALONG.

SO JUST, EVEN LIKE THE KIND
OF OMINOUSNESS OF THAT...

-LIKE IMMEDIATELY
AFTER WE HAD BEEN PLAYING IT
A LITTLE BIT, I WAS LIKE...

I NEED TO JUST HEAR MY
NAME AT THE BEGINNING.

-OH YEAH.
-LIKE I JUST NEED 
TO HEAR A 'BILLIE'

AND SO IMMEDIATELY I
THOUGHT OF MY FRIEND CALVIN,
SO I LITERALLY TEXTED HIM.

I WAS LIKE 'HEY, RECORD
YOURSELF SAYING MY NAME
AND SEND IT TO ME. THANKS'.
"BILLIE"
-AND THAT'S THE RECORDING

LITERALLY TWO
SECONDS OF HIM

SILENCE AND THEN HIM
SAYING 'BILLIE' AND THAT'S IT.

AND IMMEDIATELY WE
JUST PUT IT IN THE SONG.
-"BILLIE"
-THIS SONG IS FUCKING WEIRD.

THE SECOND, LIKE, HALF
OF THE SECOND VERSE...
SOUNDS LIKE [MAKES SOUND].

AND IT LITERALLY WAS
ME AT THE ORTHODONTIST

GETTING MY ATTACHMENTS
SHAVED OFF MY TEETH.

THIS IS THE RECORDING I TOOK
OF THE DENTIST OF THE DRILL

IN MY MOUTH OF THE,
IT'S LIKE [MAKES NOISE].
-LIQUID, YEAH.

-AND LIKE THEY PUT IT IN
YOUR MOUTH AND YOU LIKE,

CLOSE YOUR MOUTH AND
THEN IT SUCKS ALL THE...
I DON'T KNOW. BUT ANYWAY,
THAT'S WHAT YOU HEAR

AND YOU HEAR A DRILL
SHAVING OFF MY TEETH

AND IT WAS NOT
A GOOD FEELING.

AND IT DOESN'T SOUND
LIKE IT WAS A GOOD FEELING

EITHER SO THIS IS WHAT IT
WAS: [PLAYS RECORDING].
-THE WORST SOUND.

WHETHER IT'S AN ARTIST
THAT YOU'RE IN LOVE WITH

OR A PERSON THAT
YOU'RE IN LOVE WITH

OR AN IDEA THAT
YOU'RE IN LOVE WITH

AND YOU GIVE ALL OF
YOUR LOVE TO THIS PERSON.

IF YOU'RE GIVING EVERYTHING
YOU EVEN HAVE TO THIS PERSON

OR THIS IDEA OR THIS
CREATURE OR WHATEVER,

YOU'RE NOT THINKING
ABOUT YOURSELF

AND YOU'RE NOT DOING
THINGS FOR YOURSELF

AND I FEEL LIKE
THAT IS DANGEROUS.

AND I FEEL LIKE
I'VE NOTICED THAT.

AND I FEEL LIKE IT MAKES ME THE
MONSTER UNDER PEOPLES' BED.

I DON'T KNOW. IT'S A REALLY,
IT'S A HARD THING TO DESCRIBE.

WITH 'BURY A FRIEND' AND
WITH THE ALBUM AS A WHOLE,

IT'S JUST LIKE, TOO MUCH
LOVE IS ALMOST WORSE
THAN NO LOVE AT ALL.
